data.name: Bloodbath Kavkaz - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
DESCRIPTION


Bloodbath Kavkaz official soundtrack includes 56 songs made by ALTWAVE, GLWZBLL, E. Delta, Широкие молнии, Vakhtang Zimmer, Saiga and Eternity Vision, DelFine and 4 bonus songs. All Tracks in MP3.

Soundtrack can be found in Steam directory of the game (\Steam\SteamApps\common\Bloodbath Kavkaz) in the "Soundtrack" folder.

ALBUM PROPERTIES


Bloodbath Kavkaz Official Soundtrack, Bonus Tracks, Bloodbath Kavkaz DLC Soundtrack - 44100Hz; Stereo 32 (float); MP3 320 Kbps

Bloodbath Kavkaz Radio mix Vol.1 - 44100Hz; Stereo 32 (float); MP3 128 Kbps

TRACKLIST


ALTWAVE - Back to the Past
ALTWAVE - Burning September
ALTWAVE - Heart
ALTWAVE - Incoming Transmission
ALTWAVE - Miami
ALTWAVE - Solitude
ALTWAVE - The Bloody Terek
E. Delta - Guitar Tears
E. Delta - Hipper
E. Delta - Pilot is Dead
E. Delta - Trip-Loop
E. Delta - Wind
E. Delta- TAABITSCC
GLWZBLL - 90 Sketch
GLWZBLL - Classic Masked Robbery
GLWZBLL - Cleaning Service
GLWZBLL - Fancy Way to Use the Butterfly Doors
GLWZBLL - Fear and Regreat
GLWZBLL - Filler Track
GLWZBLL - Friendly Fire
GLWZBLL - Genric Club Heis Song
GLWZBLL - Getaway Gone Bad
GLWZBLL - How to Hide a Knife
GLWZBLL - Infernus II
GLWZBLL - Lovers Gone
GLWZBLL - Me
GLWZBLL - Sleepy Lane
GLWZBLL - World Eater
GLWZBLL - You
Saiga - Ranch Hand
Vakhtang Zimmer - Vibrator
Vakhtang Zimmer - Blood Orgy
Vakhtang Zimmer - Credits
Vakhtang Zimmer - Hair
Vakhtang Zimmer - Hole Im A Brain
Vakhtang Zimmer - Menu Theme
Vakhtang Zimmer - Requem
Vakhtang Zimmer - Тазы валят
Широкие молнии - Анус с блёстками
Широкие Молнии - Пластилиновый Ананас

RADIO MIX Vol.1


DelFine - Agony
DelFine - Dead Winter
DelFine - Metalophone
DelFine - Music of Mashine
DelFine - Need For Sweet
DelFine - Okinawa sun
DelFine - Orion
DelFine - Polar Lights
Delfine - The Wall
DelFine - Way Home
DelFine - Последний выдох Господина ПЖ
Eternity Vision - Flow

TRACKS FROM DLC - KHOVAN REVENGE


GLWZBLL - I Know Better
GLWZBLL - Leaving Tokyo
GLWZBLL - Odd Pill
GLWZBLL - RUN sketch
GLWZBLL - Untitled 13

+BONUS TRACKS


ALTWAVE - Can I talk to you
ALTWAVE - The Retromobile
GLWZBLL - I Know Bette
GLWZBLL - MIDI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Microsoft® Windows® Vista or higher
